description: [Daggerfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1034) used a renamed version of rundll32.exe, such as "dbengin.exe" located in the `ProgramData\Microsoft\PlayReady` directory, to proxy malicious DLL execution.(Citation: Symantec Daggerfly 2023)

external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team. (2023, April 20). Daggerfly: APT Actor Targets Telecoms Company in Africa. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
